Text:
just so you all know... the person scanning these comics (not me) hasn't gotten all the back issues done yet... he's only gotten back to issue 45, and it's got all the most recent comics up to 237.

so it's not a complete collection... but it's getting finished...

i'll make a new torrent every now and again to update it.  you shouldn't need to download everything again... i won't rename things, i'll just add to what i've got.

so if i stop seeding, check back and see if i've uploaded something new...

cheers.

(ps, i'm going on a trip tomorrow, and i'm shutting everything down, it'll be up again late saturday or early sunday...)
